recipesJson.name: Strawberry Milkshake
recipesJson.author: DodgerFog33
recipesJson.description: This is a great Starawberry Shake. The Bavarian Cream and the Biscuit Bring the thickeness and mouthfeel to the Shake. I just prefer this strawberry combination when mixing a Strawberry mix. The cream Fresh brings a nice dairy not to it. I Prefer FW vanilla Bean ice cream over Caps or TFA. Caps is too light for me and TFA a lot of people get a pepper taste. So I chose FW although all three are good. Good on Shake. Grate after 5 day steep.
